page.title: 08ST.STEPHEN'S C.P.JNR.SCHOOL
page.content: State} Founders K.C.C.1879 (new site 1957){Staff} 12+2 morning remedial. { upils 353(mixed) Ages 7-11 Subjects :full range(inc.computing) Facilities Sports:4.5 acre field 3 netball courts,swimming pool. Leisure Football,netball,gymnastics (B.A.G.A.awards),choir,computers,book shop.{Uniform}green,white/grey. Last year P.T.A.funded conversion of cloakroom into library.All Schools in block have library facilities. {Stephen's Friday afternoon.}:"We have my favourite subject at School:Art. I think it's two thirty that we have our radio programme,which is usually quite good.At the end IF we have time Mrs Lodge reads part of a story to us until three fifteen.At three fifteen its chairs up,coats on, and we're off home."
